meanings: a broom for indoor use, an indoor broom
defense, fortification, defensive works, safeguard, defensive preparations, 방비하다 defend, fortify, guard

vlive.korean: 방비 상태야? Are you not ready? 듣기 View video B.A.P : 깜짝브이

examples.korean: The town is under the shelter of a fortress. 발음듣기 그 도시는 요새로 방비되어 있다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: The town is under the shelter of a fortress. 발음

examples.korean: There was no real defense against attacks from the air. 발음듣기 공습에 대하여 진정한 방비란 없었다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: There was no real defense against attacks from the air. 발음

examples.korean: Meanwhile President Lee Myung-bak has called for the islands closest to the Northern Limit Line (NLL) to be more heavily fortified. 발음듣기 반면 이명박 대통령은 북방한계선에 가장 가까운 섬(연평도)에 더욱 더 방비를 강화할 것을 요청했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Meanwhile President Lee Myung-bak has called for the islands closest to the Northern Limit Line (NLL) to be more heavily fortified. 발음

examples.korean: take over the defense of the coast 발음듣기 해안방비에 임하다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: take over the defense of the coast 발음

examples.korean: a protection from the wind (cold, disease) 발음듣기 바람방비(防備). 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: a protection from the wind (cold, disease) 발음
